title: Little Mouse
author: Little Mouse
created_time: September 13, 2023, 07:48:40 AMLast edit: September 16, 2024, 08:04:41 AM by Little Mouse
content: Shuffle.com is looking for few active members to advertise their brand among the bitcointalk community. If you are frequently active in the gambling section, we are looking for you, and feel free to apply.Payment in BTC4x Legendary- $1005x Hero Member- $8510x Sr Member- $709x Full Member- $40Campaign Rules1. Post-bursting isn't allowed, also, you can't post half of the post count in a day. Be usual, be a forum member. I have the right to deny any of your posts as eligible.2. A minimum of 5 posts in Gambling and/or Gambling Discussion is required per week to be eligible for the payment.3. A minimum of 25 posts per week will make you eligible for the payment.4. Posts in Altcoin Cryptocurrencies, Off-topic, Games and Rounds, Investor-based games,  Invites & Accounts, Archival, Politics and Society, and any other signature/bounty campaign thread along with boards/threads where signature isn't displayed, won't be counted towards weekly post counts.5. A weekly maximum of 5 posts will be counted on the local board.6. Post in Shuffle's ANN thread isn't mandatory to get paid but feedback on the casino in their ANN thread would be appreciated.7. You must have 5 earned merits in the last 120 days to apply. The only exception if I invite you.8. You, a person, are not allowed to enroll with more than one account.9. Each week will start on Friday and end on Thursday UTC 23:59:59.10. I and Shuffle reserve the right to pause the campaign at any time.11. If you are accepted, please wear signature, avatar, and personal text. Check out the spreadsheet whether your information is correct or not.SIGNATUREMemberCode:[center]████████ [url=https://shuffle.com/]████[/url] ███ [url=https://shuffle.com/]██[/url] █
